metadata.title: CVE-2019-15678 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inrfbServerCutText handler, which can potentially result code execution..This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
directvnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
